mapper.select: select r.rentalshop_id,u.user_id,r.name,r.rental_phone,r.location,r.remain_img from RENTALSHOP r JOIN USERS u on r.uuid=u.uuid order by rentalshop_id desc

select r.rentalshop_id,u.user_id,r.name,r.rental_phone,r.location,r.remain_img, r.resub_img1,r.resub_img2,r.resub_img3,r.description,r.created_at from RENTALSHOP r JOIN USERS u on r.uuid=u.uuid where rentalshop_id=#{rentalId}
mapper.update: update RENTALSHOP set name=#{name},rental_phone=#{rental_phone},location=#{location}, remain_img=#{remain_img, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resub_img1=#{resub_img1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resub_img2=#{resub_img2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resub_img3=#{resub_img3, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description=#{description} where rentalshop_id=#{rentalshop_id}
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) from( select resort_phone AS phone from RESORT UNION ALL select ski_phone AS phone from SKI UNION ALL select rental_phone AS phone from RENTALSHOP ) where phone=#{phone}
